backend_llm_notes: Locally hosted Ollama model - gpt-oss:20b (13 GB, based on GPT architecture)
original_prompt: Land a time to meet about Project Alpha with Chris, Sangya, and Kat for 1 hour in the next 2 weeks. Schedule over 1:1s and lunches if needed and work around Kat's schedule. Make the meeting in person and add a room.

gutts.name: Extract Participant List
gutts.capability: Identify and extract the list of meeting participants from the user prompt.
gutts.user_goal: Determine who should be invited to the meeting.

gutts.name: Define Meeting Time Constraints
gutts.capability: Parse the meeting duration and the allowable time window from the user prompt.
gutts.user_goal: Know the required meeting length and the period in which it can occur.

gutts.name: Synthesize Common Availability
gutts.capability: Merge individual calendars to find mutually free 1‑hour slots within the specified window while respecting Kat’s schedule constraints.
gutts.user_goal: Identify possible meeting times that fit all participants.
gutts.evidence: Found common free slots on 2025-11-14, 2025-11-18, etc.

gutts.name: Apply Meeting Preferences
gutts.capability: Filter or prioritize slots that align with existing 1:1 meetings or lunch periods, and ensure the schedule accommodates Kat’s preferences.
gutts.user_goal: Select a time that is convenient for all, especially Kat, and matches preferred meeting types.

gutts.name: Book Meeting Room
gutts.capability: Reserve an appropriate physical room for an in‑person meeting at the chosen time.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure a venue is available for the meeting.

gutts.name: Create Calendar Event
gutts.capability: Generate a calendar invitation with participants, time, location, and meeting details.
gutts.user_goal: Officially schedule the meeting and notify attendees.
gutts.evidence: Event created: Project Alpha meeting, 2025-11-18 12:00-13:00, Room 402.

notes: Generated by Ollama gpt-oss:20b - Locally hosted LLM on macOS
